summary: This document is an email chain from November 12, 2021, regarding a draft letter to a judge (MN) concerning the admissibility of co-conspirator statements in the Ghislaine Maxwell case. It includes an attachment of the draft letter and references prior correspondence with the defense.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email chain is a letter related to her case, specifically regarding co-conspirator statements.

events.title: Draft Letter Submission Deadline
events.description: A draft letter to Judge MN regarding the admissibility of co-conspirator statements in the Ghislaine Maxwell case is due by midnight.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email chain dated November 12, 2021, concerning the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.
It discusses a draft letter to a judge (MN) seeking to admit co-conspirator statements as evidence.
The letter was due for submission at midnight on November 12, 2021.
The email references attached prior correspondence exchanged with the defense on the same topic.
